meanings.definition: The act of entering a computer system by providing valid credentials.
meanings.sent1: She quickly typed in her logins to access her email account.
meanings.sent2: Remember to keep your logins secure and not share them with anyone.
meanings.sent3: The computer system seemed to play a game of hide and seek with her logins.
meanings.sent4: His logins were like keys that unlocked the digital doors to his online world.
meanings.sent5: The logins acted as the secret code to enter the virtual realm.

meanings.definition: The username and password used to access a computer system or website.
meanings.sent1: He forgot his logins and had to reset his password.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to create strong logins to protect your online accounts.
meanings.sent3: The logins felt like a secret handshake to enter the exclusive club of the internet.
meanings.sent4: Her logins were the keys that opened the gates to her digital kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The logins were like a magic spell that granted access to the online world.
